td.content: s:a 27 yr old f with C/O Kidney. ocas ETOH on w/e she denies smoking o:Height 153 cm, Weight 70 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 16, Basic Metabolic Panel Creatinine=7.9 mg/dL,BUN=125 mg/dl,K= 6.4 meq/L,GFR=20 mL/min, Urinalysis protein=100 mg/dL, Arterial Blood Gas 6.0,PaCO2=30 mmHg,HCO3=27 meq/L a:Chronic Renal Failure p:administered Irbesartan - 150 mg daily, performed Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis, Arterial Blood Gas, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:a 28 year old white f professor presents with chronic Kidney. o:Height 154 cm, Weight 71.5 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 17 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to nephrology.

s:pt presents with Kidney for 4 days. patient is a 28 year old f. denies any smoking she drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 154 cm, Weight 71 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis, Complete, Arterial Blood Gas.
